headline: Southern Co. (SO) Suffers a Larger Drop Than the General Market: Key Insights

headline: Barclays Updates Price Target for The Southern Company (SO)
summary: The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) is included among the 12 Best Nuclear Power Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. The Southern Company (NYSE:SO), through its subsidiaries, engages in the generation, transmission, and distribution of electricity. The company also plays a leading role in the American nuclear energy sector and oversees eight reactors at three different facilities. The […]
